Types

ColorRef = ref ColorObj
ColorAny = ColorObj | ColorRef
ColorObj = object
  r*, g*, b*, a*: float

ColorRgba = object
  r*, g*, b*, a*: uint8

ColorHsv = object
  h*: 0 .. 360
  s*, v*: float
